product_overview: NooriEmaan Digital Portal is a bilingual (Urdu/English) school management system designed to streamline daily school operations including authentication, staff management, attendance scheduling, and dashboard analytics. It prioritizes responsive design, ease of use, and accessibility for school staff and administrators.
core_goals: Provide secure and bilingual login authentication for staff members.
Offer a responsive and informative dashboard with real-time data and quick actions.
Manage staff information with search and responsive views across devices.
Implement an attendance scheduling system with intuitive controls for marking presence, absence, and leave.
Support customization of UI elements such as fonts and language to enhance user experience.
Ensure smooth navigation with responsive layouts including sidebar and mobile menus, and RTL language support.
key_features: User login system based on GR number with bilingual Urdu/English interface and network status detection.
Dashboard home showing welcome banner with live clock, statistics cards placeholders, and quick action buttons.
Staff/Teachers list display with responsive tables on desktop and cards on mobile, along with search functionality.
Attendance Schedule module with tabs for daily attendance, attendance during hours, and overall summary; includes Present, Absent, and Leave buttons to mark attendance status.
Font Settings component allowing users to select custom Urdu and English fonts for enhanced readability.
Sidebar navigation with responsive design including a mobile hamburger menu and language toggle (UR/EN).
Internationalization using react-i18next supporting Urdu and English languages with RTL layout support.
Page Loader component for smooth visual feedback during page transitions.
Protected routing setup to manage user sessions and ensure authorized access.
user_flow_summary: User navigates to login page, enters GR number and password, and authenticates in chosen language (Urdu/English).
Upon successful login, user is directed to dashboard home displaying welcome banner and real-time clock.
User accesses the staff list to view or search among the 22 staff members with responsive layout adapted to device.
User navigates to Attendance Schedule to view attendance tabs and marks attendance status using Present/Absent/Leave buttons.
User customizes interface fonts and language preferences via font settings and language toggle in the sidebar menu.
User navigates through different modules using the sidebar navigation or mobile hamburger menu with smooth page transitions powered by animations.
validation_criteria: Successful GR number and password validation with appropriate error handling and bilingual messages.
Responsive design confirmed on desktop and mobile devices for all major pages particularly dashboard and staff list.
Proper functionality of language toggle with instant UI updates and correct Urdu/English translations.
Accurate attendance marking with response states when users select Present, Absent, or Leave buttons.
Font settings correctly apply chosen fonts to both Urdu and English text across the portal.
Navigation components (sidebar, hamburger menu) work correctly on all screen sizes.
Page loading animations appear during content transitions to indicate processing state.
User session persistence verified using localStorage and protected routes to restrict unauthorized access.
